title: Topic 001 Question 005
body: You need to create a new resource that will be used to perform sentiment analysis and optical character recognition (OCR). The solution must meet the following requirements:
✑ Use a single key and endpoint to access multiple services.
✑ Consolidate billing for future services that you might use.
✑ Support the use of Computer Vision in the future.
How should you complete the HTTP request to create the new resource? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
